scripts.prettier: prettier src/**/*.tex --write && git add . && git commit . --allow-empty -m":art: Run prettier"
scripts.build: docker-compose up && git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- && (echo No changes to commit) || (git add thesis_main.pdf thesis_englisch.pdf && git commit thesis_englisch.pdf thesis_main.pdf -m":white_check_mark: Update PDFs")
scripts.update: npx npm-check-updates -u --target minor --peer && npm install && git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- && (echo No packages updated) || (git add package.json package-lock.json && git commit package.json package-lock.json -m":arrow_up: Update Packages")
scripts.preversion: npm run build && npm run prettier && npm run update
scripts.postversion: git checkout main && git merge develop && git push --all && git push --all --tags
scripts.changelog: gitmoji-changelog --group-similar-commits true && git diff-index --quiet HEAD -- && (echo No changes to commit) || (git add -A CHANGELOG.md && git commit CHANGELOG.md -m":memo: Update changelog")
